resources.string: Sorry, Bluetooth Low Energy is not supported on this device.

This application will coach you through a simple breathing routine. During this time, it will collect information about your heart rate from a Polar heart rate monitor. This data will be stored on our secure server for research purposes.

By using this app, you are helping us research the effect of heart rate variability (HRV) on overall health and wellness. Thank you for participating!

When you are ready to begin, enter your first name in the field below and click "Start" to begin using the app.

To use this app, just follow these steps:

1. Put on your Polar heart rate monitor and wait until the word "Connected" appears at the top of the screen.

2. Press "Start" to begin your breathing session. Breathe in and out as instructed by the app. Please do not close the application or engage in other activities during the breathing session. Match your breathing rate as closely as possible to the progress of the blue circle on the screen. The green bar will be full when the recommended 3-minute duration has been reached.

3. After 3 minutes, you can stop the breathing session at any time by pressing the "Stop" button. You can stop the session before 3 minutes if you need to, but this will provide less useful data for our research.

4. Wait until the app says that your data has been saved before closing the app.

You can review these instructions at any time by clicking the question mark on the main screen.

Breathe in through your nose while the word “inhale” is shown, and breathe out through pursed lips while the word \"exhale\" is shown.\n\nIf you become lightheaded, stop the session and try again later.
The current breathing session is less the recommended time. If you stop now, we won\'t get the high-quality data we need for our research.\n\nAre you sure you want to stop the session now?
Your data has been uploaded successfully.\nYou may now exit the app, or begin another breathing session.
In a moment, we will ask you to grant one or more permissions to HeartBit. These permissions are required for the app to function.
Since location access has not been granted, this app will not be able to scan for the heart rate monitor.
The heart rate monitor could not be found. Please ensure it is being worn correctly before continuing.
If you are a researcher, please enter the Researcher Password below. Otherwise, please press "cancel" to return to the breathing exercise screen.
